cause.description:
Okay. This cause was created to make people aware of the fact that Glabal Warming is occuring and Stephen Harper, the Canadian Prime Minister isn't doing anything about it. If you are serious about signing this petition then please write your name and email on the wall. We will hopefully be able to get at least 5,000 signatures, so telll all your friends about this cause and even if you don't sign, spread the word about climate change. Together we'll fight this problem!!
Remember to sign the wall!
1. Global warming is the top issue in today's world
2. Something must be done about it.
3. Stephen Harper has to stop avoiding the issue and start doing something
cause.mission: Contact Candian Prime Minister, Stephen Harper, asking him to stop avoiding the climate change issue and set, among other things, emission targets for Canada.
cause.name: Stephen Harper, something about Global Warming and Climate Change - Petition
